markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Escape Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2033)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79).

 
</row>

</column>

---

The _escape fulu_ is a charm common among wealthy people, who wear the talisman in case of kidnapping. When you Activate this fulu, for 1 minute, you gain a +2 status bonus to your attempts to Escape as well as to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Escape Fulu
